医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
利巴韦林和普莱可那利治疗 1 型糖尿病的潜在益处研究人员调查了利巴韦林和普莱康那利是否可以刺激 1 型糖尿病患者的内源性胰岛素产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/The-pottial-benefits-of-ribavirin-and-pleconaril-treatment-on-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/利巴韦林-and-pleconaril-treatment-on-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment的潜在益处https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85383bca-e17e-4c67-ad18-225808ca9436 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 21:12:00 -0400 The potential benefits of ribavirin and pleconaril treatment on type 1 diabetes
COVID-19 的连锁反应：南非结核病诊断受到打击COVID-19 扰乱了南非初级卫生诊所的结核病诊断服务，凸显了对能够应对未来流行病的强大系统的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/COVID-19s-ripple-effect-South-African-TB-diagnostics-take-a-hit.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/COVID-19s-ripple-effect-South-African-TB-diagnostics-take-a-hit.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72dc01cb-69a2-459b-9395-569b687584c5 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 20:47:00 -0400 COVID-19's ripple effect: South African TB diagnostics take a hit
吸烟会损害精子质量吗？ 《抗氧化剂》杂志上的一项研究表明，吸烟会引发精子细胞的应激反应，从而导致精液质量下降。研究人员发现，吸烟者的精子质量较差，可能是由于精子细胞的应激反应升高所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Does-smoking-tobacco-damage-sperm-quality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Does-smoking-tobacco-damage-sperm-quality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a06c0a9c-1a1f-482d-9547-cc4c21f9e962 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 20:22:00 -0400 Does smoking tobacco damage sperm quality?
歧视会加剧肥胖吗？研究人员通过检查对食物线索和肠道代谢物的神经反应，发现歧视经历与肥胖风险增加之间存在潜在联系。该研究表明，歧视可能会影响不健康的食物选择，可能会破坏大脑与肠道的联系，并建议将针对大脑的治疗或饮食改变作为潜在的干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Can-discrimination-fuel-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Can-discrimination-fuel-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f29c8cef-05c1-4d61-9ed1-ca0f29addd5a Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:59:00 -0400 Can discrimination fuel obesity?
研究人员探索改善胶质母细胞瘤治疗的免疫调节靶点研究人员利用先进的单细胞 RNA 测序和创新的斑马鱼化身，深入研究了胶质母细胞瘤（一种众所周知的侵袭性脑肿瘤）复杂的异质性。他们的研究结果强调了 LGALS1 基因在免疫抑制中的作用，并为个性化 GBM 治疗提出了潜在的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Researchers-explore-immunomodulate-targets-for-improving-glioblastoma-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Researchers-explore-immunomodulate-targets-for-improving-glioblastoma-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c96357b9-c9a0-491b-819d-9645b60d00b2 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:50:00 -0400 Researchers explore immunomodulating targets for improving glioblastoma therapies
新生儿 ICU 之谜：揭开流行葡萄球菌菌株的秘密研究人员深入研究了新生儿中常见的头状葡萄球菌分离株的基因组，揭示了 NRCS-A 菌株在新生儿 ICU 中的传播模式和生存策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Neonatal-ICU-mystery-Unraveling-the-secrets-of-the-prevalent-Staphylococcus-strain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Neonatal-ICU-mystery-Unraveling-the-secrets-of-the-prevalent-Staphylococcus-strain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e793d7ed-f179-4168-b80e-807434b84287 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:44:00 -0400 Neonatal ICU mystery: Unraveling the secrets of the prevalent Staphylococcus strain
3D打印制作大脑皮层组织：脑损伤治疗的突破研究人员利用 3D 打印来制作具有组织化神经元的大脑皮层组织，为脑损伤提供潜在的治疗方法。这项新技术以逐层序列打印神经祖细胞，旨在准确修复受损大脑的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/3D-printing-crafts-cerebral-cortex-tissues-A-breakthrough-for-brain-injury-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/3D-printing-crafts-cerebral-cortex-tissues-A-breakthrough-for-brain-injury-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce80430f-a4cd-42b8-b5eb-f4a75e08deb8 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:19:00 -0400 3D printing crafts cerebral cortex tissues: A breakthrough for brain injury treatment
多样化饮食可增强骨骼：研究揭示替代饮食习惯如何预防骨质疏松症该研究探讨了地中海饮食以外的各种饮食模式如何影响老年人的骨质疏松症和骨折风险，强调饮食和运动对骨骼健康的重要性。区域饮食、锻炼和一致的研究方法对于全面的骨质疏松症预防指南至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Diverse-diets-for-stronger-bones-Study-reveals-how-alternative-eating-habits-prevent-osteoporosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Diverse-diets-for-stronger-bones-Study-reveals-how-alternative-eating-habits-prevent-osteoporosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15150dd9-991a-4f1e-bc5d-87adf95e7c89 Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:10:00 -0400 Diverse diets for stronger bones: Study reveals how alternative eating habits prevent osteoporosis
肠道健康与白血病：探索饮食与微生物群变化之间的重要联系研究人员探讨了肠道微生物群在白血病治疗反应中的作用，有证据表明饮食和益生元可能有助于控制患者微生物群的变化。怀孕期间的饮食、母乳喂养和肠道微生物群组成都有交叉，可能影响白血病风险和治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Gut-health-and-leukemia-Exploring-the-crucial-connection- Between-diet-and-microbiota-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Gut-health-and-leukemia-Exploring-the-crucial-connection- Between-diet-and-microbiota-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a8a2fd4-18d5-45b7-bf2c-890f19086d9a Sun, 08 Oct 2023 19:01:00 -0400 Gut health and leukemia: Exploring the crucial connection between diet and microbiota changes
HPV感染是前列腺癌的隐藏危险因素吗？在《科学报告》上发表的一项综合荟萃分析中，研究人员揭示了人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 感染与前列腺癌风险增加之间的显着联系，强调了将正常前列腺组织与良性前列腺增生 (BPH) 相比作为对照的重要性，以获得更准确的结果。结论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Is-HPV-infection-a-hidden-risk-factor-for-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231008/Is-HPV-infection-a-hidden-risk-factor-for-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37fb19de-d483-479d-b0e0-590fb9eff0ae Sun, 08 Oct 2023 18:53:00 -0400 Is HPV infection a hidden risk factor for prostate cancer?
